abstract: Plans to award a major construction contract for concrete work on the Guggenheim museum planned for Saadiyat Island in Abu Dhabi have been temporarily suspended.
snippet: Plans to award a major construction contract for concrete work on the Guggenheim museum planned for Saadiyat Island in Abu Dhabi have been temporarily suspended.
lead_paragraph: Plans to award a major construction contract for concrete work on the Guggenheim museum planned for Saadiyat Island in Abu Dhabi have been temporarily suspended, the Associated Press has reported. But officials from the Tourism Development and Investment Company, which is building the large cultural district in the Emirati capital that the Guggenheim will be part of, said another major museum there -- a branch of the Louvre -- is on track to open in late 2013.
